_comment: Copy this to config.json and add your own images to the examples folder

prompts.Chest X-ray: Analyze this chest X-ray. Describe the cardiac silhouette, lung fields, and any abnormalities.
prompts.Dermatology: Examine this skin lesion. Describe its characteristics and any concerns.
prompts.Pathology: Analyze this pathology image. What cellular features do you observe?
